title: Learning Experience Design (LXD) Workshop for Technology-Enhanced Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learning experience design competency development for science education in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design science learning scenarios by applying LXD (Learning Experience Design) principles
Learners can measure learning effectiveness using mobile-optimized assessment tools
Learners can analyze user experience (UX) elements in technology-based learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
